title: Razor's Edge
description: Razor has ridden with the outlaw biker gang Crux Decussata for four years, a hell-raiser, a fierce fighter, a man ready to do violence at the drop of a hat for Bulldog, the club president. He’s respected by his brothers at Crux, and his star is on the rise..Glenda Posey shows up at Breakers, the bar where Crux often hangs out and parties. She gets a rough reception but proves her mettle. Impressed, Bulldog introduces her to Razor, recently without a woman, and the sparks fly with them..But both are sitting on secrets that, when exposed, could bond them even closer, or tear them apart …
author: Lucas X. Black
